name: Tilemap Editor Pro / Level Editor
description:
This software can be used to design a level maps for your platformer game.

Made with Python/Pygame.

It gives out a .json file with an array/list output which can be used for your games.

 Both the free version and Pro version support only 3x3 tilemaps (32x32px each tile)

A newer version which supports multiple types and sizes of tilemaps WILL BE RELEASED SOON!

-PERKS OF PRO VERSION:-

1. Build bigger maps

2. Better looking UI

3. Adjustable map size

4. Runs smoother even in older PCs
